EmailTemplate.name: PR Request
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI. Please feel free to touch base with our PR agency regarding these opportunities. They are an extension of our Marketing Team and will be able to provide you further assistance.
Backbone Media:
Lizzie Strazza lizzie.strazza@backbonemedia.net
Thacher Stone thacher.stone@backbonemedia.net
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
